ygData.subject: The monster
ygData.msgSnippet: Hatred. Such a powerful, yet dangerous feeling. First the Decepticons. Hating them for destroying Cybertron, for ruining the balance, for unlocking Unicron

Hatred.

Such a powerful, yet dangerous feeling. First the Decepticons. Hat=
ing
them for destroying Cybertron, for ruining the balance, for unlocking
U=
nicron (though I only found out much later), and for killing Prime.
We mana=
ged to suppress them, to oppress them, to reduce their
malevolence to just =
a bitter resentment. That suited us fine. We them
reformatted. We became Ma=
ximals and they Predacons.

After a long time, I came here. I had heard the=
 stories, and I hated
the slavedrivers that had attacked our colonies. I us=
ed my hatred
constructively, and I helped rebuild those broken lives. I thr=
ew my
lot in with them so that nothing like that would happen again. Ever.
=

Of course, I couldn't have been more misguided. The Minions, those
Fallen =
Spawns wrecked us more effectively than our terrible civil wars
ever did. A=
nd I hated them for that.

Now, I see that the alliance we had does not hol=
d anymore. I should
hate you for that. Surprisingly, I don't think I do. I =
might become
soft. Maybe I just start looking at the big picture. Whatever =
it is, I
have to do what I must do. Why? Because I can. No better reason, i=
s there?

                                  *****

He rose. The hinges on t=
he restraints groaned as he forced to get away
from the wall.

???: That's =
it, my slave! Show me how strong you are! Show me the
stuff of your will!

=
With a thunderous clap, the restraints broke free from the wall. He
was not=
 held anymore.

???: Yes! That's it! Now bow before your master!

A thin, e=
vil smile.

???: No.

???: No? [A hearty, maniacal laugh] You don't underst=
and who you're
playing with, Magnus!

???: I do. Don't you remember? Your f=
orced repairs, your tweakings,
your adjustments. You changed my spark. Ultr=
a Magnus is dead. So are you.

In a flash, he who had been Ultras Magnus ro=
se his powerful arms and
bore everything he had on his would-be master. Mac=
hine guns roared,
RPGs thudded, laser rifle blazed. In a short few seconds,=
 only a
smoldering scrap remained, spark cavity now empty.

???: I'm Ultra =
Magnum, and I'm the boss around.

Slowly, with cold determination and a bur=
ning hatred, Ultra Magnum
made his way outside, leaving more Iron Skull cor=
pses around. Magnus
had died inside, and the monster lived in his stead.
